name: Gingerbread Man Jump
description:
Controls: MOVE (WASD or Arrow Keys) JUMP(Z or M)

Created for the 32-Bit Game Jam 2021

Please understand that this game is unfinished and created during a very short amount of time by one overworked developer with a normal job. 

Development Roadmap

  • ✓First beta for 32Bit Game Jam 2021
  • Receive player feedback
  • Music & Audio
  • Improved player physics
  • More Levels

  • ...

Update Notes

  • 12/29/21: Gameplay and graphical improvements

Please report any bugs in comments.

THANKS FOR PLAYING!
